testcase.name: Test Add Product in Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Users navigates to home page..........................................passed And Click on 'products' button..............................................passed When Users click 'Add to cart' in product 'Blue Top'........................passed And Click 'Continue Shopping' button........................................passed And Click on 'Cart' button..................................................passed Then Users will get the result products are added to Cart...................passed

testcase.name: Test Verify Product Quantity in Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Users navigates to home page..........................................passed And Click on 'products' button..............................................passed When Users Click 'View Product' for any product.............................passed And Users add Increase quantity to 6........................................passed And Click 'Add to cart' button..............................................passed And Click 'Continue Shopping' button........................................passed And Click on 'Cart' button..................................................passed Then Product is displayed in cart page with exact quantity 6................passed

testcase.name: Test Remove Product From Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Users navigates to home page..........................................passed And Click on 'products' button..............................................passed When Users click 'Add to cart' in product 'Blue Top'........................passed And Click 'Continue Shopping' button........................................passed And Click on 'Cart' button..................................................passed And Click 'X' button corresponding to particular product....................passed Then Product is removed from the cart.......................................passed
